## Background

Assisted reproductive technology (ART) is a group of medical procedures to enable conception due to reduced fertlity.
It includes:

* Fertility medication (ovulation induction)

* Gamete intra-fallopian transfer (GIFT) 

* Intra-uterine insemination (IUI)

* In vitro fertilization (IVF)

* Intracytoplasmic sperm injection (ICSI)
